targets.expr:
sum by (app_kubernetes_io_instance, pod, app_kubernetes_io_component, apps_kubeblocks_io_component_name) (mysql_up{app_kubernetes_io_instance="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_component="gms"})
or
sum by (app_kubernetes_io_instance, pod, app_kubernetes_io_component, apps_kubeblocks_io_component_name) (polardbx_up{app_kubernetes_io_instance="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace"})
or 
sum by (app_kubernetes_io_instance, pod, app_kubernetes_io_component, apps_kubeblocks_io_component_name) (mysql_up{app_kubernetes_io_instance="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_component="dn"})
or 
sum by (app_kubernetes_io_instance, pod, app_kubernetes_io_component, apps_kubeblocks_io_component_name) (polardbx_cdc_up{app_kubernetes_io_instance="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace"})
